name: Schooled In
description:
IT doesn't work :(

Although I do have a build that DOES work, I can't replace it with this build.

Well, there is a better working build you can download here. 

Will it count? Hopefully, but I doubt it... Please consider the fixed version of the game when judging, if at all possible. Please.

Normal description:

Uh oh, looks like someone's in detention! Your assignment? Write the same sentence over and over and over and over and... it's STILL not over? If only there was a way you could retaliate against your mean teacher... oh wait, there is!

It's time to make a mess! Throw items around, scribble on practically anything, and discover secrets that lie within the classroom. The bigger a mess you make, the more points you get! 

Note: This game has been tested on Oculus VR systems only. Although it does have support for HTC Vive, Valve Index, and Windows Mixed Reality, these remain untested. Motion controllers required, room scale VR optional.

Good luck to all the other competitors, and thanks for checking out our game!

Team members:

Andy Herbert - Lead Programmer / Project Coordinator

Amelia Herbert - 2D/3D  Artist / Programmer

Claudia Celio - 3D Artist / Animator
